title: Cerveau gele
creator_credit: Pierre Moretti, Rene Jodoin and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Claude Dubois sings out against the petrifying effect of growing cities. The images on the screen form and reform to reflect his sentiments. Music by Claude Dubois and photography by Claude Lapierre.
creator_credit_for_label: Pierre Moretti, Rene Jodoin and National Film Board of Canada
